text:
Scientific python developer @Blue Brain Project| Geneva, Switzerland | ONSITE | Full-time

The EPFL Blue Brain Project (BBP) applies advanced neuroinformatics, data analytics, high-performance computing and simulation-based approaches to the challenge of understanding the structure and function of the mammalian brain in health and disease. We are looking for an experienced Scientific Python Developer to strengthen our scientific software engineering team.

https://recruitingapp-2863.umantis.com/Vacancies/452/Descrip...

e-mail: jobs.bbp@epfl.ch
